data.name: Jur
data.description:
Jur is a decentralized ecosystem aimed at solving the justice gap, giving professional and small and medium enterprises better access to justice through a dispute resolution process legally binding in 166 countries worldwide.

JUR (VIP-180) is the native utility token built on VeChainThor blockchain that is used for:

* Staking of the Hubs providing the dispute resolution service
* Payment for accessing services
* Voting

Jur also has ongoing R&D activities in the micro claims sector. Its micro justice solutions to address the problem are available on the [Jur Beta Platform](https:/beta.jur.io).

Jur AG is headquartered in the so-called crypto valley of Zug, in Switzerland.

## How many JUR tokens are in circulation?

JUR tokens were launched on August 28, 2019 through an IEO on the OceanEx exchange.

1 billion JUR tokens were created at genesis.

* 10% of the tokens were sold in the initial private sale.
* 10% of the tokens were distributed in the public sale related to the IEO
* 10% are reserved to the team
* 30% is reserved to support operations and tech development
* 20% is reserved for business development activities
* 20% is the company reserve

## Who are the founders of JUR?

JUR started with the idea of CEO Alessandro Palombo (lawyer and PhD in Public Law and Master in Regulation of Global Markets) later joined by Luca Y. Daniel tech entrepreneur who previously built Aguadulce a Wired-featured digital agency.

The Jur team today includes a core team of professionals, a network of advisors led by [Mark OBE Beer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Beer) and a Scientific Committee that supports the legal framework behind the project that features ex Vice President of the European Parliament, [Ms. Diana Wallis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diana_Wallis).

## Where can I buy JUR tokens?

JUR is available for trading on the OceanEx exchange platform.

[OceanEx](https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/oceanex)

New to cryptocurrency? Read CoinMarketCap’s [easy guide](https://coinmarketcap.com/how-to-buy-bitcoin/) to buy Bitcoin or any other token.
